citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on
21Jan2026. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone/text. The licensee was unable to return in
time for the inspection process and future hours of availability were discussed.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 
21Jan2026. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone/text. The licensee was unable to return in 
time for the inspection process and future hours of availability were discussed.  
 
 Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
